titles: Weepe with ioy a lamentation for the losse of our late soueraigne lady Queene Elizabeth, with ioy and exultation for our high and mightie Prince, King Iames, her lineall and lawful successor.
publisher: By V.S. for Edmund Mutton, dwelling in Pater-noster-row, at the signe of the Hunts-man,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
